title: Africa: Breakthrough Promises Improved Access to TB Treatment Across Africa
description: [allAfrica] Cape Town -- An American drug manufacturer has taken an important step to open the way to improved access to the treatment of multidrug-resistant tuberculosis (MDR-TB) across Africa.

title: Africa: U.S. Drug Company Eases Access to Multidrug-Resistant Tuberculosis Treatment
description: [JNJ] Company continues to be focused on addressing perceived barriers to access and refocusing global efforts on the most-pressing barrier to access: underdiagnosis of the disease.
